OfferingCore_init(address,address,addres.details: Use this for MultiInit during diamond deployment

invest(uint256,bytes32).details: Frontend should query subgraph for investor's valid attestation and pass it here      This eliminates need for investors to store attestations in their wallets (better UX!)

params.attestationUID: EAS attestation UID for investor verification (can be bytes32(0) if not required)

OfferingCore_init(address,address,addres.notice: Standardized initialization function for MultiInit (like DiamondLoupe_init)

claimRefund(uint256).notice: Claim refund after grace period (INVESTOR PROTECTION)

getInvestorTotalInvestment(address).notice: Get total investment amount for an investor across all their investments

rejectInvestment(uint256).notice: Reject investment and refund investor (ISSUER PROTECTION)
